text: A progress indicator should be incorporated to provide users with clear feedback during multi-step processes.
Inline validation on forms will help users identify and correct errors in real - time , improving efficiency and reducing frustration .
These features are essential for meeting the expectations of modern mobile users.2Performance TargetsCritical performance targets must be met to ensure a responsive and efficient user experience.
The initial screen load time should be less than 1 second to minimize user wait times and improve perceived performance.
Tap response time should be under 100 milliseconds to provide immediate feedback and create a fluid interactive experience.
All interactive elements must have large touch targets to accommodate users with motor impairments and improve usability on smaller screens .
The user interface must also adhere to WCAG AA color contrast guidelines to ensure readability for users with visual impairments.
